SqlDefinition.SqlCommand: SELECT ID, `Name` AS 'Name',TypeDescribe,ImageUrl,"" AS FullUrl,TypeSort, DATE_FORMAT(IFNULL(`ModificationDate`,`CreationDate`),'%Y-%c-%d %h:%i:%s') AS OperatioinDate FROM `TB_MB_ArticleType` WHERE `Status`=TRUE <%= AND NAME LIKE @@Type_Name@@%> ORDER BY OperatioinDate DESC <%= LIMIT @@StartSize@@ , @@PageSize@@%>; SELECT COUNT(1) AS total FROM `TB_MB_ArticleType` WHERE `Status`=TRUE <%= AND NAME LIKE @@Type_Name@@%>;
UPDATE TB_MB_ArticleType SET STATUS=FALSE WHERE ID=@@ID@@

SELECT ar.`ID`,ar.`ArticleType_ID`,ar.`ArticleTitle`,ar.`ImageUrl`,"" AS FullUrl,DATE_FORMAT(ar.`PublishDate`,'%Y-%c-%d %h:%i:%s') AS PublishDate,ar.`ArticleSort`,ar.`PraiseCount`,ar.`CommentCount`,ar.`ReadCount`,art.`Name` FROM `TB_MB_Article` ar JOIN `TB_MB_ArticleType` art ON ar.`ArticleType_ID`=art.`ID` WHERE 1=1 AND ar.status=TRUE <%= AND (art.`Name` LIKE @@Search@@ or ar.`ArticleTitle` LIKE @@Search@@) %> ORDER BY IFNULL(ar.`ModificationDate`,ar.`CreationDate`) DESC <%= LIMIT @@StartSize@@ , @@PageSize@@%>; SELECT COUNT(1) AS total FROM `TB_MB_Article` ar JOIN `TB_MB_ArticleType` art ON ar.`ArticleType_ID`=art.`ID` WHERE 1=1 AND ar.status=TRUE <%= AND (art.`Name` LIKE @@Name@@ or ar.`ArticleTitle` LIKE @@Search@@) %>;
